name: Yoga
description: It is known as the corrector of the curvature and makes the spine flexible. The curve structure of the asana massages the deep back muscles, spine and nerves

name: Font-squat
description: Font-squat is a compound, full body exercise that trains primarily the muscles of the thighs, hips and buttocks, hamstrings, as well as strengthening the bones, ligaments, and insertion of the tendons throughout the lower body

name: Skip
description: To jump lightly over a rope that is held in both your hands, or by two other people, and swung repeatedly under your legs and over your head as an exercise or a game

name: Dumb-Bell
description: A short bar with a weight on each end that you lift up and down to make your arm and shoulder muscles stronger

name: Treadmill
description: Treadmill is an exercise machine that has a moving surface that you can walk or run on while remaining in the same place

name: Barbell
description: Barbell a piece of a tool used in weight training, bodybuilding, weightlifting, and powerlifting, consisting of a long metal bar with weights attached at each end

name: Plank
description: Plank is an isometric core strength exercise that involves maintaining a position similar to a push-up for the maximum possible time

name: Shoulder press
description: Shoulder press a piece of a tool used in weight training, bodybuilding, weightlifting, and powerlifting, consisting of a long metal bar with weights attached at each end

name: Treadmill
description: Treadmill is an exercise machine that has a moving surface that you can walk or run on while remaining in the same place
